Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Western, North Avenue, Homan and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Western, North Avenue, Homan and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at 51st/King
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, King, 47th Cottage Grove and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/King.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, King, 47th Cottage Grove and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/King.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
